be.haraka.game4.Graphics

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.haraka.game4.Graphics.Window

  • public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    Main graphics class. Contains a list of ObjectInstance to render. It also contains a reference to the World object. The objective of this is to isolate as much as possible the Model from the Graphics part, as we want to run the server from the same Model codebase.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()
        Initialize the window by resizing the gdx window and loading the model list.

      • render

        public void render(float deltaTime)
        Part of the Game.render() game loop. Renders all the object instances and the tiles.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the elapsed time since the last render call. Used mainly for animations.

      • newObject

        public void newObject(GameObject o)
        Called by Game, alerts the Graphic part that a new GameObject has been created. Will create a new GameInstance.
        Parameters:
        o, - the new GameObject.

      • deleteObject

        public void deleteObject(GameObject o)
        Same as newObject(GameObject), but when a GameObject gets deleted. Will delete the corresponding GameInstance.
        Parameters:
        o, - the deleted GameObject.

      • setTilesInstances

        public void setTilesInstances(World world)
        Initializes the Gameobject instances from the world tiles.
        Parameters:
        world -

      • sortRenderInstances

        public void sortRenderInstances()
        Sorts the render Instances by they're position.
